primevc.core.states.IFiniteStateMachine

type
interface
implements
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
haxe.rtti.Infos
Interface describing the FiniteStateMachine

Static Variables

__rtti : String

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal2<primevc.core.states._IFiniteStateMachine.NewStateprimevc.core.states._IFiniteStateMachine.OldState>

Change dispatcher. First parameter is the new state, the second parameter is the old state.

current(default,setCurrent) : IState

Current state of the group. State must be in the states list.

defaultState(default,setDefaultState) : IState

State that will be used when there is no state set.

states(default,null) : primevc.utils.FastArray<IState>

Collection of states that the current statemachine can have.

Instance Methods

disable() : Void

Disable the current state group. It's not posible to switch from states when the group is disabled.

disableInState(trigger : IState) : Void

parameters
trigger
Method will disable the stategroup when the given state is entered. The StateGroup won't be automaticly enabled when the given state is exited.

enable() : Void

Enabel the current state group. The group will be allowed to siwtch from states again when it's enabled.

enableInState(trigger : IState) : Void

parameters
trigger
Method will enable the stategroup when the given state is entered. The StateGroup won't be automaticly disabled when the given state is exited.
